import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { faRightFromBracket, faUsers,} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu-mobile', templateUrl: './menu-mobile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu-mobile.component.scss'] }) export class MenuMobileComponent { faRightFromBracket = faRightFromBracket; faUsers = faUsers; }
